name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Comments, Including Nested Replies for IG

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comment Extractor for IG to Extract Instagram Comments including Nested Comments and export to CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly extract Instagram comments with our powerful IG Comment Extractor! 

Export comments, including nested replies, to CSV in just a few clicks.

# Features
✓ Extract comments from any Instagram post (including nested replies)
✓ Export data to CSV for seamless analysis
✓ User-friendly interface for quick data extraction
✓ The Dashboard page supports sorting, filtering, and search functions.

# Why Choose Our IG Comment Extractor? 
Our extension simplifies data management by allowing you to export all Instagram comments from any user's post, including nested conversations. It's perfect for marketers, data analysts, and social media managers who need to analyze engagement or track conversations for any post.

# How to get started?
1. Add to Chrome
2. Click the download comment icon button on the post page.

# Data Privacy
All the data you process is on your local computer and never passes through our servers. 

# Statement
There is a risk that your account may be deactivated or blocked by IG when using the extension and you should control the frequency of use at your own risk.

# About Pro
It's a paid extension, you can export the first free quota comments of each extraction for free trial.
